--00000000000034248f059954e3a4
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"

OOC: I'd like to echo what Solstice (THE CODE) was saying. I was around for
several iterations of this RPG in the middle of it's life.  I usually went
by Titobeau or rm2kmidi.  This was a fun place where I got to play around
with writing and learned how to develop characters that didn't suck.

I'm in the process of archiving everything here as well. Though I don't
know if I'll ever read this stuff, I feel like NBWRPG was an important part
of my life and I met a lot of people here.

From what I understand, on December 14th these archives will be purged and
new content will not be archived on YahooGroups.  They will still be
allowing these email lists to function as they did before though.  So while
this group has been dead since 2012 or so, if we ever get the urge, it will
still be here.... for now.

See y'all!

-Alex  (Titobeau)

--00000000000034248f059954e3a4
Content-Type: text/html; charset="UTF-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
